text: This page lists the World Best Year Performance in the year 2005 in both the men's and the women's race walking distances: 20 km and 50 km (outdoor). One of the main events during this season were the 2005 World Championships in Helsinki, Finland. ==Abbreviations== *All times shown are in hours:minutes:seconds {| class="wikitable" style="
